我们很想听听加密货币如何对您或您周围人的生活产生积极影响。

; Thu, 13 Jul 2023 18:01:04 GMT https://twitter.com/binance/status/1679551534101569538 https://twitter.com/binance/status/1679551534101569538 Binance #BinanceTurns6 celebrates our community, OGs and newcomers alike. But if you're not a Binancian yet, we also have something planned for you: 🔸 Sign...#BinanceTurns6 celebrates our community, OGs and newcomers alike.

但如果您还不是币安用户，我们还为您准备了一些计划：

🔸 在#Binance 上注册并验证
🔸 完成任务
🔸 分享 4,600 美元的粉丝代币奖励
